text: Rest in Peace () is a 2024 Argentine Paraguayan thriller movie directed by Sebastián Borensztein and starring Joaquín Furriel, Griselda Siciliani, Gabriel Goity, Lali González, Raúl Daumas. It is distributed by Netflix. Category:2024 thriller movies Category:Argentine thriller movies Category:Paraguayan movies Category:Movies set in Argentina Category:Movies set in Paraguay
title: Rest in Peace (movie)
